subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Geno Auriemma, who led the United States to its fifth consecutive Olympic gold in women’s basketball in London, said he had no interest in returning as coach of the national team for the 2016 Olympics.
snippet: Connecticut Coach Geno Auriemma, who led the United States to its fifth consecutive Olympic gold in women’s basketball in London, said he had no interest in returning as coach of the national team for the 2016 Olympics.
